name: codebase-context-dumper_dump_codebase_context
description: Recursively reads text files from a specified directory, respecting .gitignore rules and skipping binary files. Concatenates content with file path headers/footers. Supports chunking the output for large codebases.

base_path.description: The absolute path to the project directory to scan.

num_chunks.description: Optional total number of chunks to divide the output into (default: 1).

chunk_index.description: Optional 1-based index of the chunk to return (default: 1). Requires num_chunks > 1.
